locale.name: ru_RU
locale.message: Are you sure you want to reset all email templates in this journal? You will lose any customizations you have made.
Внимание: файловый менеджер позволяет просматривать файлы и директории журнала.
Sorry, no additional languages are available. Contact your site administrator if you wish to use additional languages with this journal.
This will be the default language for the journal site.
Remove this user from this journal? This action will unenroll the user from all roles within this journal.

Enrollment synchronization will enroll all users enrolled in the specified role in the specified journal into the same role in this journal. This function allows a common set of users (e.g., Reviewers) to be synchronized between journals.
Вы уверены, что хотите убрать данный раздел? Все статьи в нем надо будет перенаприть в другие разделы, иначе они исчезнут.
Select from among the available Section Editors and "Assign Editor" to this section.
Статьи в этот раздел могут присылать только редакторы.
An abbreviated title is required for the section
Не показывать этот раздел в Содержании журнала.
В метаданных укажите идентификатор для статей этого раздела
Items in this section to be included in the indexed content of journal.
Add the following content, using text/HTML, which will appear below the homepage image, if one is uploaded.
Alternately, instead of title and logo, an HTML version of the header can be inserted into the text box below. Leave textbox blank if not required.

Set out for authors the bibliographic and formatting standards used for items submitted to the journal (e.g., Publication Manual of the American Psychological Association, 5th edition, 2001). It is often helpful to provide examples of the common citation formats for journals and books to be used in submissions. Also identify the types of appropriate Supplementary Files (e.g., data-sets, research instruments, etc.) which authors should be encouraged to upload, in addition to their submission, to enhance readers' engagement with their work.
Другие организации и люди, оказывающие финансовую и иную поддержку журнала.
Внизу Вы видите детальный набор указаний в HTML, которые можно использовать в качестве примера.
(E.g., European Renaissance; Jurassic Period; Third Trimester; etc.)
Provide examples of relevant chronological or historical terms for this field
Refers to geo-spatial location, chronological or historical coverage, and/or characteristics of research sample.
(E.g., Iberian Peninsula; Stratosphere; Boreal Forest; etc.)
Provide examples of relevant geo-spatial or geographical terms for this field
Provide examples of research sample characteristics for this field
Появятся в HTML кодировке любой страницы журнала (напр. метатеги).
Имя журнала, ISSN, контакты, спонсоры и поисковики.
Useful when journal crosses disciplinary boundaries and/or authors submit multidisciplinary items.
(E.g., History; Education; Sociology; Psychology; Cultural Studies; Law)
Provide examples of relevant academic disciplines for this journal
Перейти к членам коллегии и добавить новых редакторов или рецензентов. Это можно сделать в любое время.
One or more editors handle the basic steps without designated roles.
Managing Editor handles Submission Queue, Scheduling Queue, and Table of Contents, while Section Editors handle Submission Review and Submission Editing.
Managing Editor handles Submission Queue, Submission Editing, Scheduling Queue, and Table of Contents, while the Section Editors handle Submission Review.

Journals have Editorial Boards to oversee the editorial direction of the journal, participate in the appointment of editors, and, by virtue of board members' reputations, give the journal some standing in the field. Review Boards play a similar role but in addition, they lead the peer review process. Review Board members will not have access to the journal's administrative system but will be added to the list of those available to do peer reviews.
Any undeliverable emails will result in an error message to this address.

The prepared emails that are sent by the system on behalf of the journal will have the following signature added to the end. The body of the prepared emails are available for editing under Journal Management.
Страницы вводятся в Содержание дбя саждого отдельного материала (напр. с. 13-26, или просто с. 13).
Enter a statement below, which will appear in About the Journal, that speaks to authors, readers, and librarians about the range of articles and other items which the journal will publish.
For Authors to Index Their Work

OJS adheres to the Open Archives Initiative Protocol for Metadata Harvesting, which is the emerging standard for providing well-indexed access to electronic research resources on a global scale. The authors will use a similar template to provide metadata for their submission. The Journal Manager should select the categories for indexing and present authors with relevant examples to assist them in indexing their work, separating terms with a semi-colon (e.g., term1; term2). The entries should be introduced as examples by using "E.g.," or "For example,".
The number of reviewers per submission is required.
Set the initial issue/volume numbers and year for the first publication of the journal, as well as intended frequency for issue/volumes.
Note: Leave items blank if not used with this journal, and editors can re-set numbers in the publishing process.
Add an image or graphic file to the middle of the page.
HTML can be used in textarea (for font size, color, etc.), with "returns" treated as <tt><br></tt>; HTML editor works with Firefox browsers.
Brief descriptions of the journal for librarians and prospective authors and readers are available in the "Information" section of the sidebar.
Depending on the format selected, identify the issue, volume, and/or year of the first issue to be published with OJS:

The ISSN (International Standard Serial Number) is an eight-digit number which identifies periodical publications as such, including electronic serials. It is managed by a world wide network of National Centres coordinated by an International Centre based in Paris, backed by Unesco and the French Government. A number can be obtained from the ISSN web site. This can be done at any point in operating the journal.
Navigation bar items can be added to the current set (Home, About, User Home, etc.) that appear at the top of the page.
Add a brief 20-25 word description in text/HTML which will appear just below the navigation links.

By default, the homepage consists of navigation links. Additional homepage content can be appended by using one or all of the following options, which will appear in the order shown. Note that the current issue is always accessible through the Current link in the navigation bar.
Можно загрузить графическую версию оглавления журнала.

This is the footer of your journal. To change or update the footer, paste the HTML code in the textbox below. Examples could be another navigation bar, a counter, etc. This footer will appear on every page.

A graphic version of the journal's title and logo (.gif, .jpg, or .png file), possibly a smaller version of the one used on the homepage, can be uploaded to appear as a header on journal pages, which will replace the text version that otherwise appears.
Invalid journal stylesheet format. Accepted format is .css.
Здесь можно добавить указания для форматирования журнала как в HTML, так и в чистом тексте. Каждый журнал может иметь свое собственное оформление.
Enter the maximum number of items (for example, submissions, users, or editing assignments) that appear on each page of a list, and the number of pages links to display on each page.
Enable LOCKSS to store and distribute journal content at participating libraries via a LOCKSS Publisher Manifest page. A LOCKSS license will appear in About the Journal under Archiving:
See other versions of a LOCKSS license.

Identify 6-10 libraries that will register and cache the journal. For example, turn to institutions where editors or Board members work and/or institutions already participating in LOCKSS. See participating libraries. Use the prepared invitations for (i) libraries participating in LOCKSS or (ii) libraries not yet participating in LOCKSS.
Заголовки, дизайн, содержание, логотипы, навигация, форматы журнала.
Add or remove additional navigation bar items.
URL is an absolute URL (e.g., "http://www.example.com") rather than a path relative to the site (e.g., "/manager/setup")
The label value is a literal string (e.g., "Journal Setup") rather than a localization message key (e.g., "manager.setup")

SJ supports "open access" by reducing management and publishing costs and can be implemented in a variety of ways. The journal's content can be made free to readers or SJ's subscription module can be used to support (a) partial open access, with select items made available immediately, (b) delayed open access, with contents made available some time after initial publication, and (c) developing-nation open access, based on registering IP addresses from local institutions. In addition, editors are encouraged to join the overwhelming majority of journals that have a policy permitting authors to archive the work published in this journal in institutional repositories and eprint archives. If some form of open access can be granted or permitted, this should be described below, and it will appear in About the Journal.

Outline the journal's peer review policy and processes for readers and authors, including the number of reviewers typically used in reviewing a submission, the criteria by which reviewers are asked to judge submissions, typical time taken to conduct the reviews, and the principles for recruiting reviewers. This will appear in About the Journal.
Охват, предметные области, система рецензирования, разделы, рубрики, приватность, доступ, надежность.
Ответственный редактор журнала или издатель, имя которого появится на главной странице журнала в разделе Контакты, вместе с Секретарем.
This statement will appear in About the Journal, as well as on the Author Submission and Notification sign-up pages. Below is a recommended privacy policy, which can be revised at any point.
Ввести здесь конкретные указания, которые будут доступны всем заинтересованным и уполномоченным лицам.

Journal items can be published collectively, as part of an issue with its own Table of Contents. Alternatively, individual items can be published as soon as they are ready, by adding them to the "current" volume's Table of Contents. Provide readers, in About the Journal, with a statement about the system this journal will use and its expected frequency of publication.

The Review Guidelines provide reviewers with criteria for judging a submission's suitability for publication in the journal, as well as any special instructions for preparing an effective and helpful review.
Automated email reminders will be sent to a reviewer (editor can also email reviewer)
Can be modified during the editorial process.
Редакторы могут оценить рецензии по пятибалльной системе.
If reviewer has not responded to a review request within
If reviewer has not submitted a recommendation within
Reviewers will have access to the submission file only after agreeing to review it.

OJS supports two models for managing the review process. The Standard Review Process is recommended because it steps reviewers through the process, ensures a complete review history for each submission, and takes advantage of automatic reminder notification, and standard recommendations for submissions (Accept; Accept with revisions; Submit for review; Submit elsewhere; Decline; See comments).

Select one of the following:

When the Section Editor sends Reviewers a request to review, it will include the submission as an attachment. If Reviewers are willing, they will first email their assent, and later email their review and recommendation to the Editor. The Editors will the copy the review under the Reviewer's name on the Review page and enter the Reviewer's recommendation for the submission, ensuring that the system has a record for review process.

Editors will email selected Reviewers the title and abstract of the submission, as well as an invitation to log into the journal web site to complete the review. Reviewers enter the journal web site to agree to do the review, to download submissions, submit their comments, and select a recommendation.
Добавьте краткое описание журнала и ключевые слова для поисковиков.
(If sections are not added, then items are submitted to the Articles section by default.)

To create or modify sections for the journal (e.g., Articles, Book Reviews, etc.), go to Section Management.

Authors on submitting items to the journal will designate...
The journal editor who will see it through the editorial process.
The journal section for which the item will be considered.
Название организации, оказывающей финансовую и иную поддержку журнала (напр. ученые общества, кафедры, объединения и т.д.).
(E.g., Mathematics Subject Classification; Library of Congress Classification)
(E.g., Photosynthesis; Black Holes; Four-Color Map Problem; Bayesian Theory)
Provide examples of keywords or topics as a guide for authors

On making a submission to the journal, authors are first asked to check each item on the Submission Preparation Checklist as completed, before proceeding. The checklist also appears in the Author Guidelines, under About the Journal. The list can be edited below, but all items on the list will require a checkmark before authors can proceed with their submission.
Указания авторам, авторские права, лицензии, условия регистрации.

This person will be listed on the journal's Contact page for the use of editors, authors, and reviewers, and should have experience working through the system from the perspective of all of its roles. As this journal system requires very little technical support, this should be seen as a part-time assignment. There may be occasions, for example, when authors and reviewers have difficulties with the instructions or file formats, or there's a need to ensure that the journal is regularly backed up on the server.
(E.g., Historical Inquiry; Quasi-Experimental; Literary Analysis; Survey/Interview)
Provide examples of relevant research types, methods, and approaches for this field
Статьям и выпускам можно присвоить уникальный идентификационный номер типа Digital Object Identifier (DOI).
Are you sure you want to delete this subscription?
A subscription end date is required.
Please select a valid subscription end date.
A subscription start date is required.
Please select a valid subscription start date.
Enter a domain if the subscription type is for institutions. If a domain is entered here, the IP range is optional. Valid values are domain names (e.g. lib.sfu.ca).
The selected subscription type requires a domain and/or an IP range for subscription authentication.

Enter an IP range if the subscription type is for institutions. If an IP range is entered here, the domain is optional. Valid values include an IP (e.g. 142.58.103.1), an IP range (e.g. 142.58.103.1 - 142.58.103.4), an IP range with '*' (e.g. 142.58.103.*), or any combination of these separated by a ';' (e.g. 142.58.103.* - 142.58.107.* ; 142.58.108.1 ; 142.58.106.*)
Please enter a valid IP range.
Enter membership information if the subscription type requires that subscribers belong to an association or organization.
The selected subscription type requires membership information.
Send the user a notification email containing their username and subscription details.
In order to send the user a notification email, the subscription contact name and email address must be specified in the journal Setup.
This user already has a subscription for this journal.
Please select a valid subscription type.

Choose which user you wish to subscribe to the journal. Note that a journal's Managers, Editors, Section Editors, Layout Editors, Copyeditors, and Proofreaders are always free to browse the journal as if they were subscribers.
Warning! All subscriptions with this subscription type will also be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue and delete this subscription type?
Enter a numeric value (e.g. 40 or 40.00). Do not include any other text such as "$".
The cost must be a positive, numeric value.
The length of the subscription, in number of months (e.g. 12).
The duration must be a positive, numeric value.
A subscription type format is required.
Please select a valid subscription type format.
Subscribers should be validated via domain or IP authentication.
Subscribers must be members of an association or organization.
A subscription type with this name already exists.
A subscription type name is required.
No subscription types have been created.
